name: Book of Ra Deluxe Slot
description:
This game lights up the eyes of every slot fan. Book of Ra online is THE slot game - and the growth of its popularity is showing no signs of stopping.

But what makes Book of Ra™ deluxe so exciting? The adventure it takes you on!
Explore your way deeper and deeper into an Egyptian pyramid and try to locate the sparkling treasure of the pharaohs.

With a little luck, you’ll discover enough Book symbols to trigger the thrilling Free Games which feature special expanding symbols. Pure excitement guaranteed!

What’s more, online Book of Ra is so popular that there’s now a whole series of sequels, including a jackpot and Bingo version. Where can you play them? In our online casino, of course!

Book of Ra™ deluxe at a glance:
- 5 reels
- Up to 10 win lines
- The Book of Ra is the special symbol (Scatter)
- A chance to trigger 10 or more Free Games with a special expanding symbol

How do you get spinning at Book of Ra™ deluxe?
It couldn’t be simpler: Get the app, register at GameTwist, and away you go. What’s more, a wide variety of further awesome games is waiting for you at GameTwist!
